statements: SELECT * FROM UnauthorizedAccessAttempts;
SELECT id, username FROM UnauthorizedAccessAttempts WHERE access_result = 'FAILED';
SELECT * FROM UnauthorizedAccessAttempts WHERE access_location = 'Office';
SELECT username, access_time FROM UnauthorizedAccessAttempts WHERE access_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, username, access_result FROM UnauthorizedAccessAttempts ORDER BY access_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM UnauthorizedAccessAttempts WHERE username = 'admin' ORDER BY access_time DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM UnauthorizedAccessAttempts WHERE access_result = 'FAILED';
SELECT id, username, access_location FROM UnauthorizedAccessAttempts WHERE access_location LIKE '%New York%' AND access_result = 'SUCCESS';
SELECT * FROM UnauthorizedAccessAttempts WHERE access_time BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT username FROM UnauthorizedAccessAttempts WHERE access_result = 'FAILED';
SELECT * FROM unauthorized_access_attempts;
SELECT username, ip_address FROM unauthorized_access_attempts ORDER BY attempt_time DESC;
SELECT attempt_id, username, attempt_time FROM unauthorized_access_attempts WHERE username='admin';
SELECT MAX(attempt_time) AS latest_attempt_time FROM unauthorized_access_attempts;
SELECT username, COUNT(*) AS total_attempts FROM unauthorized_access_attempts GROUP BY username ORDER BY total_attempts DESC;
SELECT * FROM unauthorized_access_attempts ORDER BY attempt_time DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT username, attempt_time FROM unauthorized_access_attempts WHERE username='admin';
SELECT log_id, username, log_time FROM access_monitoring_logs WHERE username='user1' ORDER BY log_time ASC;
SELECT ip_address, COUNT(*) AS attempts FROM unauthorized_access_attempts GROUP BY ip_address HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
SELECT * FROM access_monitoring_logs WHERE action_taken='Login' OR action_taken='Logout' ORDER BY log_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM UnauthorizedAttempts;
SELECT id, username, time_stamp FROM UnauthorizedAttempts WHERE status = 'failed';
SELECT username, ip_address, action FROM AccessLogs ORDER BY time_stamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM SecurityAlerts WHERE username = 'admin' AND ip_address = '192.168.0.1';
SELECT alert_id, alert_message, alert_time FROM SecurityAlerts WHERE alert_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM UnauthorizedAttempts WHERE status = 'failed' ORDER BY time_stamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT username, ip_address FROM AccessLogs WHERE action = 'login' AND ip_address = '192.168.1.10'
SELECT username, alert_message, alert_time FROM SecurityAlerts WHERE alert_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY alert_time ASC
SELECT DISTINCT username FROM AccessLogs WHERE time_stamp >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_attempts FROM UnauthorizedAttempts GROUP BY username HAVING total_attempts > 5
SELECT * FROM unauthorized_attempts;
SELECT id, username, timestamp FROM user_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT username, action_type FROM user_logs WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT id, pattern_name FROM access_patterns WHERE description LIKE '%security%';
SELECT username, role FROM access_control WHERE access_level > 3 ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM unauthorized_attempts WHERE status_code = 401 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, username, action_type FROM user_logs WHERE username = 'admin' AND action_type = 'LOGIN' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT username, role FROM access_control WHERE access_level > 3;
SELECT * FROM unauthorized_attempts WHERE ip_address = '192.168.1.10' AND status_code = 403;
SELECT pattern_name, description FROM access_patterns WHERE pattern_name LIKE '%authentication%';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, role FROM authorized_users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, timestamp, action FROM access_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM authorized_users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT * FROM failed_login_attempts WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT username, role FROM users WHERE user_id = '7f80d8eb-b757-4f2e-b9ed-530c9da60be4';
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT user_id, role, username FROM users WHERE user_id IN ('7f80d8eb-b757-4f2e-b9ed-530c9da60be4','b48e872f-4912-4030-8c72-2c97bc27e2cf','dc17c007-4ed1-4b46-9b18-2b963f36b2e9');
SELECT MAX(timestamp), action, log_id FROM access_logs GROUP BY action ORDER BY MAX(timestamp) DESC;
